BIO

Hi there ! I'm Amogh from Pratapgarh, India. I'm currently working as a Project Engineer at Wipro. I have years of experience creating software, android apps and websites for both myself, and for clients. I have experience programming in many languages such as C, C++, Python, Java, however some of my favourite projects involve working in the IoT domain & Web Development. I'm graduate from Galgotias College of Engineering & Technology, Greater Noida in Computer Science Engineering & also I love to play football.
